dct_description_sm: Shows borders of the new state of Ukraine established by the Treaty of Brest-Litovsk as well as borders that had not yet been established. The latter include parts of the borders with the German Empire and southern Moldova, and with the Soviet Union to the northeast. The map does not include even a tentative border separating extreme eastern Ukraine and the Soviet Union. Also shows towns, railroads, and various industries.
Relief shown by shading and spot heights.
Cited and annotated in: Zeitschrift für das realschulwesen / Emanuel Czuber, Adolf Bechtel, Ignaz Wallentin. Wien : Alfred Hölder, 1918, page 435.
dct_publisher_sm: Kartogr. Anstalt G. Freytag & Berndt, Ges. m. b. H.,
